name: Operating a distributed search index in a content delivery network
description: The system breaks a document search index into segments organized by document field and hash-based groupings of query terms, each containing a traversable index subtree, and publishes them on a content delivery network for distributed access.

name: Operating in a content delivery network a distributed search index based on an automatically-selected set of documents properties
description: A system automatically selects which document properties to include in a search index by using an inference model or by prompting a large language model with document contents and their associated property names.

name: Operating in a content delivery network a distributed search index for performing vector search
description: A search index shard contains an executable routine that takes a query's semantic meaning representation, compares it against stored semantic representations of documents, and returns the IDs of documents whose meanings are within a threshold level of similarity to the query.
